verses.name: Proverbs 14:1
verses.text: Every wise woman buildeth her house: but the foolish plucketh it down with her hands.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:2
verses.text: He that walketh in his uprightness feareth the Lord: but he that is perverse in his ways despiseth him.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:3
verses.text: In the mouth of the foolish is a rod of pride: but the lips of the wise shall preserve them.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:4
verses.text: Where no oxen are, the crib is clean: but much increase is by the strength of the ox.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:5
verses.text: A faithful witness will not lie: but a false witness will utter lies.
